channel.title: Please Help?
channel.description: Can someone please help me with this. Whenever i run a file like a client or something it opens the cmd then it closes less then a second later. How do i fix it? :( It says: 'java' is not a recognized as an iternel or externel command, operable program or batch file.

item.title: Please Help?
item.dc:creator: @Guthix_Rule Guthix Rule
item.description:
@Guthix_Rule wrote:

I have tried both of those things and still nothing is working?
It stopped working when i dled Utorrent[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 05, 2008, 09:19:53 pm[/size][hr]Ok now it says that the port is already is in use and nothing is running?

Read full topic
